summary: Follower Facelifts for Vanilla + DLC. (Males & Females)
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/23674-1-1405613931.jpg[/img]

========================================================================================

[color=GreenYellow][size=3][u][b]Installation:[/b][/u][/size][/color]

1) Download with Manager.
2) Activate Mod.

[color=yellow][size=3][u][b]IMPORTANT:[/b][/u][/size][/color]

Load Order example:

CorrectGenderAnimations.esp
CorrectGenderAnimations-DG.esp
CorrectGenderAnimations-DB.esp
UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul.esp
UFO - Hearthfire AddOn.esp
UFO - Dawnguard AddOn.esp
[color=deeppink][b]FollowerFacelifts.esp[/b][/color]
[color=deeppink][b]FollowerFaceliftsHearthfire.esp[/b][/color]
[color=deeppink][b]FollowerFaceliftsDawnguard.esp[/b][/color]
[color=deeppink][b]FollowerFaceliftsDragonborn.esp[/b][/color]
[color=DodgerBlue][b]FollowerFaceliftsMales.esp[/b][/color]
[color=DodgerBlue][b]FollowerFaceliftsMalesHearthfire.esp[/b][/color]
[color=DodgerBlue][b]FollowerFaceliftsMalesDawnguard.esp[/b][/color]
[color=DodgerBlue][b]FollowerFaceliftsMalesDragonborn.esp[/b][/color]
Follower Trap Safety.esp
moveit.esp

========================================================================================

[color=GreenYellow][size=3][u][b]FAQ:[/b][/u][/size][/color]

Q: My follower(s) still have Male Animations.
A: The Gender Animation Fix implented in 2.6 will only work with a New Game. Nothing i can do about that.

Q: Some followers have a strange dark spot in the corners of their mouth.
A: This is a known issue with the Navetsea Face, you can find a fix over at my [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/53670]Navetsea Face Fixes[/url] Mod.

Q: I'm not really liking follower X, will you adjust?
A: No, this is the way i like them. Feel free to edit them yourself in the Creation Kit.

========================================================================================

[color=GreenYellow][size=3][u][b]Mods Used for Females:[/b][/u][/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6554][b]Navetsea Female Face[/b][/url] by Navetsea
